se.background.description: Define a background image for each area.
se.background.showType.fullScreen: Display background image in full screen
se.background.fullScreen.imgUrl: Full-screen background image URL, effective when the display area is set to full-screen mode
se.background.fullScreen.opacity: Full-screen background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.titlebar.imgUrl: Menu bar background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
se.background.titlebar.opacity: Menu bar background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.banner.imgUrl: Banner background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
se.background.banner.opacity: Banner background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.activitybar.imgUrl: Activity bar background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
se.background.activitybar.opacity: Activity bar background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.sidebar.imgUrl: Main sidebar background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
se.background.sidebar.opacity: Main sidebar background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.editor.imgUrl: Editor background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
se.background.editor.opacity: Editor background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.panel.imgUrl: Panel background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
se.background.panel.opacity: Panel background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.auxiliarybar.imgUrl: Auxiliary sidebar background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
se.background.auxiliarybar.opacity: Auxiliary sidebar background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.statusbar.imgUrl: Status bar background image URL, effective when the display area is set to area mode
se.background.statusbar.opacity: Status bar background image opacity, ranging from fully transparent 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
